applet.name: DarkFlatSkinInstaller
applet.title: Dark Flat Skin Installer
applet.desc: This applet installs the Dark Flat Skin for Squeezeplay (for 800 x 480 resolution, based on JogglerSkin). More information, screenshots and FAQ on https://github.com/AF-1 Windows and Linux users: please read the FAQ BEFORE installing.
applet.creator: AF

applet.name: DarkFlatSkinInstaller
applet.title: Dark Flat Skin Installer
applet.desc: This applet installs the Dark Flat Skin on your piCorePlayer (for 800 x 480 resolution, based on JogglerSkin). More information, screenshots and FAQ on https://github.com/AF-1
applet.creator: AF

applet.name: DarkFlatSkinInstaller
applet.title: Dark Flat Skin Installer
applet.desc: This applet installs the Dark Flat Skin on your SB Touch (based on WQVGAsmallSkin). More information, screenshots and FAQ on https://github.com/AF-1. See FAQ for information on known SB Touch issue.
applet.creator: AF

applet.name: NPwithRatingsInstaller
applet.title: NowPlaying Screen with Ratings Installer
applet.desc: This applet installs a NowPlaying screen with ratings on your SB Radio (for QVGAlandscapeSkin). More information, screenshots and FAQ on https://github.com/AF-1
applet.creator: AF

plugin.name: AlternativePlayCount
plugin.title: Alternative Play Count
plugin.desc: Provides alternative play counts and skip counts that aim to reflect your true listening history. You set a time after which a song counts as played. If you skip the song before, it counts as skipped, not played. Create (scheduled) backups, restore from backups. More information on the GitHub page.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: CustomSkip3
plugin.title: Custom Skip 3
plugin.desc: Lets you set player-specific rules for when the current track or upcoming tracks in your playlist should be skipped and removed from the playlist automatically. More information on the GitHub page.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: CustomStartStopTimes
plugin.title: Custom Start Stop Times
plugin.desc: Allows you to start and stop tracks at a specific playback/song time or to skip over a specific part inside the song (e.g. silence). Just add custom start, stop or skip times to a track's comments tag and, with the help of this plugin, the song will start or end, when you want it to, or skip an unwanted part. No more annoying song intros or minutes of silence. More information on the GitHub page.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: CustomTagImporter
plugin.title: Custom Tag Importer
plugin.desc: Scans track information from custom tags in your music files (incl. rating tags). More information on the GitHub page.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: DarkDefaultSkin
plugin.title: Dark Default Skin
plugin.desc: Dark-themed version of the LMS Default skin. Screenshots and more information on GitHub.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: DynamicPlaylists4
plugin.title: Dynamic Playlists 4
plugin.desc: Use smart playlists (dynamic playlists) to play continuous music mixes based on your selection criteria. Comes with a number of ready-to-use dynamic playlists. More information on the GitHub page.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: DynamicPlaylistCreator
plugin.title: Dynamic Playlist Creator
plugin.desc: Helps you create custom smart playlists (dynamic playlists) for the Dynamic Playlists plugin using templates. More information on the GitHub page.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: RatingsLight
plugin.title: Ratings Light
plugin.desc: Takes care of rating your tracks. Set track ratings (also with plugins/apps and IR remote). Import track ratings from file tags or playlists. Export track ratings to playlist files. Create (scheduled) backups, restore from backups. Create virtual libraries for (top) rated tracks. Browse (top) rated tracks by artist or genre (browse menus). Keep track of your recently rated songs with a dedicated playlist or log file. Show rated songs for artist, album, genre, year or playlist (context menu). Support for online library tracks where possible. Includes "Don't Stop The Music" mixes. More information on the GitHub page.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: VirtualLibraryCreator
plugin.title: Virtual Library Creator
plugin.desc: Create custom virtual libraries with optional LMS browse menus using a template in a browser or by adding files with customized SQLite statements. More information on the GitHub page.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: VisualStatistics
plugin.title: Visual Statistics
plugin.desc: Have a look at your library statistics with charts. More information on the GitHub page.
Explorez les statistiques de votre librairie avec des graphiques. Plus d'information sur la page GitHub.
Bekijk jouw mediabibliotheek statistieken door middel van grafieken
plugin.creator: AF
